class.rdfs:comment: A strategy of regulating the intake of food to achieve or maintain a specific health-related goal.
class.rdfs:label: Diet

schema:dietFeatures.rdfs:comment: Nutritional information specific to the dietary plan. May include dietary recommendations on what foods to avoid, what foods to consume, and specific alterations/deviations from the USDA or other regulatory body's approved dietary guidelines.
schema:dietFeatures.rdfs:label: dietFeatures

schema:endorsers.rdfs:comment: People or organizations that endorse the plan.
schema:endorsers.rdfs:label: endorsers

schema:expertConsiderations.rdfs:comment: Medical expert advice related to the plan.
schema:expertConsiderations.rdfs:label: expertConsiderations

schema:overview.rdfs:comment: Descriptive information establishing the overarching theory/philosophy of the plan. May include the rationale for the name, the population where the plan first came to prominence, etc.
schema:overview.rdfs:label: overview

schema:physiologicalBenefits.rdfs:comment: Specific physiologic benefits associated to the plan.
schema:physiologicalBenefits.rdfs:label: physiologicalBenefits

schema:risks.rdfs:comment: Specific physiologic risks associated to the diet plan.
schema:risks.rdfs:label: risks
